These Interactions can include Service disruptions, Service Requests, Requests for Information (RFI), or Complaints reported by users via Self-Service portal (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SUPPORT.EPAM.COM (ESP)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") or by using instant messages, phone, E-mail.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are also cases when new Interaction creation in ESP can be initiated in the scope of different business processes: for example, New Employee Request submitted in UPSA initiates the creation of the corresponding Interaction in ESP. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After Interactions are submitted in the system, they can go through a set of pre-defined approvals that can be collected automatically or manually. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once Approvers have reviewed and approved the Interaction records Service Request or Incident is created for them. The requests are then fulfilled by Work (Assignment) Groups or purchased through external vendors:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) If the Interaction is resolved without escalating to other Work (Assignment) Groups, the Service Desk Agent can close the Interaction record\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) If the Interaction cannot be resolved without involvement of other Work (Assignment) Groups it is escalated to a Service Request or Incident and is assigned to an appropriate Work (Assignment) Group for further processing\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once the Service Request or Incident is resolved, Service Requestor is informed about this and they can rate and close the Interaction (or ESP closes it automatically after a five-day period).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/99ead063-c310-4342-9a37-245b9b85dbbe/8.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1237,\"height\":399}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each workflow step is accompanied with notifications sent from Auto_ESP e-mail account to appropriate person.
